body.name: GEODMAER 65% Wireless Gaming Keyboard, Rechargeable Backlit Gaming Keyboard, 68 Keys Ultra-Compact Anti-ghosting No-Conflict Keyboard for PC Laptop PS5 PS4 Xbox One Mac Gamer (White-Red)

features: 【65% Compact Design】GEODMAER Wireless gaming keyboard compact mini design, save space on the desktop, novel white & red keycap color matching, separate arrow keys, No numpad, both gaming and office, easy to carry size can be easily put into the backpack. NOTE: The feature that automatically turns off after 20 seconds of long press on a key has been modified to a long press of 30 minutes before it automatically turns off.

【2.4G Wireless Keyboard】Mature 2.4G wireless connection technology, providing 10M ultra-long effective connection distance, ultra-low latency and excellent connection stability, ultra-fast response speed, so you can not feel any delay.

【2000 mAh Battery】500 Hours nop-stop use time without light, 50 Hours of maximum brightness backlight nop-stop use time, super long use time so you do not have the trouble of frequent charging, auto-sleep function will automatically sleep state when you do not carry out any operation, just click any key to activate, through type- c for charging (included in the package), can be used while charging.

【RGB Backlit Keyboard】Wireless Gaming Keyboard using the new two-color injection molding key caps, characters transparent luminous, in the dark can also clearly see each key, through the light key can be OF/OFF Backlit, FN + light key can switch backlit mode, always bright / breathing mode, FN + ↑ / ↓ adjust the brightness increase / decrease, FN + ← / → adjust the breathing frequency slow / fast.

【Ergonomics & Mechanical Feel Wireless Keyboard】The ergonomically designed keycap height maintains the comfort for long time use, protects the wrist, and the mechanical feeling brought by the imitation mechanical technology when using it, an excellent mechanical feeling that can be enjoyed without the high price, and also a quiet membrane gaming keyboard.

【3 Years After-Sales Service】When you buy GEODMAER keyboard you get 3 years of after-sales service. During this period, if you encounter any quality problems, or if you have questions during use, just contact us and your problem will be solved within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Keyboard Would Purchase Again
reviews.reviewText: I didn't want to spend a fortune to still lose at Fortnite so I purchased this.The speed at which Fortnite recieves the commands I enter through my keyboard did increase -the game responded more quickly, though maybe it was that I was using an older keyboard before.The keyboard works well, and it's well worth the money I paid for it, I would absolutley purchase again!God so loved the world that He gave His one and only Son. Anyone who believes in Him will not die but will have eternal life. John 3:16 NIRV “Believe in the Lord Jesus [as your personal Savior and entrust yourself to Him] and you will be saved, you and your household [if they also believe].” Acts 16 :31 AMP And if anyone’s name was not found written in the Book of Life, he was hurled into the lake of fire. Revelation 20:15 AMPTherefore if anyone is in Christ [that is, grafted in, joined to Him by faith in Him as Savior], he is a new creature [reborn and renewed by the Holy Spirit]; the old things [the previous moral and spiritual condition] have passed away. Behold, new things have come [because spiritual awakening brings a new life]. 2 Corinthians 5:17 (Amplified Bible)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So in the picture above it shows this keyboard compared to a full size keyboard it's literally laying on top of it much smaller. The RGB is really bright and pretty. You can turn the rbg on and off with a key on the keyboard. It has a power switch on the back. It takes USB-C charging. The key sounds are very similar to a mechanical keyboard. None of the keys are sticky It is a very nice small compact keyboard. The USB dongle comes in the back, and it has two kickstands to sit it up. it's a very well made keyboard plug it right in and it starts up. Would recommend a hundred times more. (Home build PC running windows 10)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good starter keyboard
reviews.reviewText: I got this for a starter keyboard for a kid, and this is exactly what I would recommend it for. It looks cool and seems to function well if it works at all. Sometimes you need to unplug and replug the USB dongle to get it recognized. After that it seems to work fine for a few days. Battery life seems perfectly reasonable, although I haven't stretched it yet to see if it follows the claims.Would I recommend it? Absolutely for the price for a kid that may destroy it tomorrow by accidentally dropping it or stepping on it. The connection issues are the only thing keeping it from 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Keyboard has a key malfunction
reviews.reviewText: This is my second keyboard (after returning my first and receiving a replacement) and by the second day it begins to lose its coordination somewhere and doesn’t register what i type. With or without the charger it still malfunctions. I don’t see the point in struggling anymore. Not worth the purchase. You also have to box it and label yourself so don’t toss your box peeps!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wireless gaming keyboard
reviews.reviewText: Keyboard is great, keys really feel soft and not cheap compared to some other keyboards in the same price range. The fact that is wireless gives you a lot more freedom on where to put it, and it saves you from those cables. Everything works as advertised, RGB works great, you can't really notice any delay. Kind of sad I didn't order the whole pack with mouse, but I think their keyboard is really good and would definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you're trying out keyboard and mouse to play video games for the first time, as I am, this is a great keyboard to start out with. It comes with rgb (which is cool) but you cannot change the color, it's just set for you. The keyboard feels sturdy but weighs a considerable amount given how small it is, whether or not that's because of the RGB or not is unknown to me. I would give this a higher rating but it just costs a lot and is very clicky. I understand the majority of people like loud and clicky keyboards but personally, I do not. I wish there was an option to request it being a silent click keyboard or a loud click keyboard, or even just put in the details that it's a loud keyboard. I also learned that you can have the RGB fade in and out (I do not know why or if it's a color code option). Overall, for a starter keyboard, it's not bad but for the price that it is, you can find something cheaper that's just as good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like it should.
reviews.reviewText: I at first received one that was not working (it may have been a returned item), but had it replaced within a week and the new one works fine. Gifted it to someone with limited space and it fits perfectly. The colors are bright as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars stops working over time
reviews.reviewText: i ordered this key board about 2 months ago and now it stops working fine. i constantly have to take out the usb connector and turn it off and on for it to start typing again. This began to happen within the first month of me having it and now it seems to be a pattern. I left it charging because maybe that would solve the problem but within 20 minutes it began to stop typing and me having to turn it off and on and take out the usb again.
